articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Famous Work Published in Grenada
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Famous Work Published in Grenada 
    Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy" was brought out in pamphlet by the Grenadian Speedy Printers Publishing House.
 The work, made public on July 26, Juche 85 (1996), comprehensively elucidates the originality and superiority of the Juche philosophy as compared with the preceding philosophy of the working class. And it expounds that the Juche philosophy is the revolutionary and political philosophy of the Workers' Party of Korea and indicates questions of principle that should be grasped in its study and explanation.

Letter of Rep. of KPA Panmunjom Mission Distributed as Official Doc. of UNSC
articles.content:
Letter of Rep. of KPA Panmunjom Mission Distributed as Official Doc. of UNSC 
    Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- A letter from the representative of the Panmunjom Mission of the Korean People's Army to the secretary general of the United Nations was distributed as official document No. S/2004/592 of the UN Security Council on July 30.
 The letter dated July 22 is related to the fact that a touch-and-go war danger has been created on the Korean peninsula by the on-going massive arms buildup of the United States in south Korea.

articles.title: All Seniormost Members of DWP on Hunger Sit-down
articles.content:
All Seniormost Members of DWP on Hunger Sit-down 
    Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- All the 12 seniormost members of the Democratic Workers' Party of south Korea went on a hunger sit-down on July 31 for the withdrawal of the decision on troop dispatch to Iraq, according to south Korean KBS.
 They replaced Kim Hye Gyong, representative of the party, after she was carried to a hospital for the deterioration of health in her hunger strike which she started on July 23 in demand of the withdrawal of the decision.

Kim Yong Dae Meets Mongolian Friendship Del.
articles.content:
Kim Yong Dae Meets Mongolian Friendship Del.
    Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Dae, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with a Mongolian friendship delegation led by D. Bilegt, general secretary of the Federation of Peace and Friendship Organizations of Mongolia, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 On hand were Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and Mongolian Ambassador to the DPRK Janchivdorjyn Lomvo.

articles.title: Director-General of FAO Arrives Here
articles.content:
Director-General of FAO Arrives Here
    Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Jaques Diouf, director-general of the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations, arrived here Wednesday.
 He was greeted at the air port by Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Choe Su Hon who is chairman of the National Committee of the FAO and Abu Y. M. Selim, acting resident coordinator of the United Nations here.
 The DPRK government hosted a reception in honor of the director-general this evening.
